articles.title: Brics plus 6: the outcome of the Jo’burg summit
articles.description: Six countries are set to join Brics—Argentina, Egypt, Ethiopia, Iran, Saudi Arabia and the UAE. While some have hailed the move as giving a new lease of life to a moribund group, others believe it could amplify weaknesses. Mint breaks down what happened in South Africa:
articles.content: The meeting took place over three days. The leaders of Brazil, India, China and South Africa attended it in person, but Russia’s Vladimir Putin participated virtually following an arrest warrant issued by the International Criminal Court for alleged ... [2490 chars]

articles.title: ‘Not made any formal request to join BRICS,’ says Pakistan
articles.description: BRICS group of nations on Thursday decided to include six new members -- Argentina, Ethiopia, Egypt, Iran, Saudi Arabia and the UAE. The new membership will be effective from January 1, 2024
articles.content:
Pakistan on Friday said the country has not made any formal request to join the BRICS grouping, after its recent summit concluded in Johannesburg on Thursday.
Foreign Ministry spokesperson Mumtaz Zahra Baloch said the country will examine the latest ... [2258 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Marseille sign Argentina forward Correa on loan from Inter
articles.description:
Olympique de Marseille have signed Argentina forward Joaquin Correa on loan with an option to buy from Serie A side Inter Milan, the Ligue 1 club said on Friday.
Correa joined Inter in August 2021 from league rivals Lazio on a one-year loan with an obligation to buy.
